title: [COMPLETE] OCE Server Maintenance - 6th June 2018 @ 1:00am AEST
body:
Hi folks

We'll be doing some planned server maintenance on the 6th June.  This means that for a few hours, the OCE LoL servers will be offline.  Here's what you need to know:

 * Ranked queues will be offline from 11:30pm AEST on 5th June
 * All games in progress will be stopped at 1:00am AEST on the 6th.
 * The LoL servers will be unavailable for up to 6 hours.  
 * ETA coming back up is 7:00am or before.

For the most up to date info, keep an eye on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) page.

Cheers!
Mindstar

replies.body: Is it possible to get some clarification on what this maintenance is relating to?

We're doing some upgrades to some of the systems that the platform itself is hosted on - this is under-the-hood upgrades that help us keep the servers running smoothly and able to deploy new things to them.  There won't be in any game related changes here.

The reason it is a bit earlier than we would normally do this for OCE, is that this covering some services that are also used by other regions, so we need to span a few timezones to make this work.

Cheers!
Mindstar
Can someone tell me What is servers GMT?
